mapper.select: SELECT job_seq_id AS jobSeqId, job_name AS jobName, job_parameter AS jobParameter, job_execution_id AS jobExecutionId, polling_status AS pollingStatus, create_date AS createDate, update_date AS updateDate FROM batch_job_request WHERE polling_status = 'INIT' AND group_id = #{groupId} ORDER BY job_seq_id ASC LIMIT #{pollingRowLimit}
